DECLARE @date VARCHAR(20), @date_y VARCHAR(20), @date_m VARCHAR(20), @oldYearStart varchar(20), @newYearStart varchar(20) SET @date_y=$Year$ SET @date_m=$Month$ if(len(@date_m)<2) SET @date_m = '0'+@date_m SET @date=@date_y+'-'+@date_m if(len(@date)=0) SET @date=CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),getdate(),120) else if(len(@date)<8) SET @date=@date+'-01' --以9月为开始 年YTD if(convert(INT,substring(@date,6,2))>=9) begin SET @oldYearStart = CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), CONVERT(INT ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(4),@date,120))-1)+'-09-01 0:00:00' SET @newYearStart = CONVERT(VARCHAR(4),@date,120)+'-09-01 0:00:00' end else begin SET @oldYearStart = CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), CONVERT(INT ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(4),@date,120))-2)+'-09-01 0:00:00' SET @newYearStart = CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), CONVERT(INT ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(4),@date,120))-1)+'-09-01 0:00:00' end;
WITH LY_YEAR AS ( SELECT bdi.ITEM_NAME AS bannerId, sum(dbo.fn_getUnitConvById(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID, $Unit$, dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE, dds.PROD_QUANTITY)) AS qli
FROM DMS_DATA_SALE dds --关联产品 INNER JOIN DMS_PROD_MAPPING dpm ON dds.PROD_CODE = dpm.DIST_PROD_CODE AND dds.CLIENT_ID = dpm.CLIENT_ID AND dds.PROD_UNIT=dpm.DIST_PROD_UNIT INNER JOIN MDM_PRODUCT mp ON mp.PROD_CODE = dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE --关联门店 INNER JOIN DMS_STORE_MAPPING dsm ON dds.STORE_CODE = dsm.DIST_STORE_CODE INNER JOIN MDM_STORE ms ON ms.STORE_CODE = dsm.target_store_code INNER JOIN BASE_DICT_ITEM bdi ON bdi.DICT_ITEM_ID = ms.CORP_ID --关联客户、经销商 INNER JOIN DMS_CLIENT dc ON dds.CLIENT_ID = dc.CLIENT_ID INNER JOIN MDM_DISTRIBUTOR md ON md.DIST_ID = dc.DIST_ID --关联单位转换表 --LEFT JOIN MDM_UNIT_CONVERSION muc ON muc.PROD_CODE=dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE AND muc.CONV_UNIT1_ID=dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID AND muc.CONV_UNIT2_ID=$Unit$
WHERE dds.BILL_DATE >= @oldYearStart and dds.BILL_DATE <= ( select dateadd(ms,-3,DATEADD(mm, DATEDIFF(m,0, $Year$ +'-'+ $Month$ +'-01')-11, 0)) ) $orgId$ $banner$ and mp.PROD_CODE not in ('zengpin','qita','tingchan') GROUP BY bdi.ITEM_NAME ) ,LY_MONTH AS ( SELECT bdi.ITEM_NAME AS bannerId, sum(dbo.fn_getUnitConvById(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID, $Unit$, dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE, dds.PROD_QUANTITY)) AS qli
FROM DMS_DATA_SALE dds --关联产品 INNER JOIN DMS_PROD_MAPPING dpm ON dds.PROD_CODE = dpm.DIST_PROD_CODE AND dds.CLIENT_ID = dpm.CLIENT_ID AND dds.PROD_UNIT=dpm.DIST_PROD_UNIT INNER JOIN MDM_PRODUCT mp ON mp.PROD_CODE = dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE --关联门店 INNER JOIN DMS_STORE_MAPPING dsm ON dds.STORE_CODE = dsm.DIST_STORE_CODE INNER JOIN MDM_STORE ms ON ms.STORE_CODE = dsm.target_store_code INNER JOIN BASE_DICT_ITEM bdi ON bdi.DICT_ITEM_ID = ms.CORP_ID --关联客户、经销商 INNER JOIN DMS_CLIENT dc ON dds.CLIENT_ID = dc.CLIENT_ID INNER JOIN MDM_DISTRIBUTOR md ON md.DIST_ID = dc.DIST_ID --关联单位转换表 --LEFT JOIN MDM_UNIT_CONVERSION muc ON muc.PROD_CODE=dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE AND muc.CONV_UNIT1_ID=dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID AND muc.CONV_UNIT2_ID=$Unit$
WHERE DATEPART(yy, dateadd(yy, -1, $Year$))=DATEPART(yy, dds.BILL_DATE) AND DATEPART(mm, dds.BILL_DATE)=$Month$ $orgId$ $banner$ and mp.PROD_CODE not in ('zengpin','qita','tingchan') GROUP BY bdi.ITEM_NAME )
,TY_YEAR AS ( SELECT bdi.ITEM_NAME AS bannerId, sum(dbo.fn_getUnitConvById(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID, $Unit$, dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE, dds.PROD_QUANTITY)) AS qli
FROM DMS_DATA_SALE dds --关联产品 INNER JOIN DMS_PROD_MAPPING dpm ON dds.PROD_CODE = dpm.DIST_PROD_CODE AND dds.CLIENT_ID = dpm.CLIENT_ID AND dds.PROD_UNIT=dpm.DIST_PROD_UNIT INNER JOIN MDM_PRODUCT mp ON mp.PROD_CODE = dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE --关联门店 INNER JOIN DMS_STORE_MAPPING dsm ON dds.STORE_CODE = dsm.DIST_STORE_CODE INNER JOIN MDM_STORE ms ON ms.STORE_CODE = dsm.target_store_code INNER JOIN BASE_DICT_ITEM bdi ON bdi.DICT_ITEM_ID = ms.CORP_ID --关联客户、经销商 INNER JOIN DMS_CLIENT dc ON dds.CLIENT_ID = dc.CLIENT_ID INNER JOIN MDM_DISTRIBUTOR md ON md.DIST_ID = dc.DIST_ID --关联单位转换表 --LEFT JOIN MDM_UNIT_CONVERSION muc ON muc.PROD_CODE=dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE AND muc.CONV_UNIT1_ID=dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID AND muc.CONV_UNIT2_ID=$Unit$
WHERE dds.BILL_DATE >= @newYearStart and dds.BILL_DATE <= ( select dateadd(ms,-3,DATEADD(mm, DATEDIFF(m,0, $Year$ +'-'+ $Month$ +'-01')+1, 0)) ) $orgId$ $banner$ and mp.PROD_CODE not in ('zengpin','qita','tingchan') GROUP BY bdi.ITEM_NAME ) ,TY_MONTH AS ( SELECT bdi.ITEM_NAME AS bannerId, sum(dbo.fn_getUnitConvById(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID, $Unit$, dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE, dds.PROD_QUANTITY)) AS qli
FROM DMS_DATA_SALE dds --关联产品 INNER JOIN DMS_PROD_MAPPING dpm ON dds.PROD_CODE = dpm.DIST_PROD_CODE AND dds.CLIENT_ID = dpm.CLIENT_ID AND dds.PROD_UNIT=dpm.DIST_PROD_UNIT INNER JOIN MDM_PRODUCT mp ON mp.PROD_CODE = dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE --关联门店 INNER JOIN DMS_STORE_MAPPING dsm ON dds.STORE_CODE = dsm.DIST_STORE_CODE INNER JOIN MDM_STORE ms ON ms.STORE_CODE = dsm.target_store_code INNER JOIN BASE_DICT_ITEM bdi ON bdi.DICT_ITEM_ID = ms.CORP_ID --关联客户、经销商 INNER JOIN DMS_CLIENT dc ON dds.CLIENT_ID = dc.CLIENT_ID INNER JOIN MDM_DISTRIBUTOR md ON md.DIST_ID = dc.DIST_ID --关联单位转换表 --LEFT JOIN MDM_UNIT_CONVERSION muc ON muc.PROD_CODE=dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE AND muc.CONV_UNIT1_ID=dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID AND muc.CONV_UNIT2_ID=$Unit$
WHERE DATEPART(yy, dds.BILL_DATE)=$Year$ AND DATEPART(mm, dds.BILL_DATE)=$Month$ $orgId$ $banner$ and mp.PROD_CODE not in ('zengpin','qita','tingchan') GROUP BY bdi.ITEM_NAME )
,base AS ( SELECT tm.bannerId AS bannerId ,'-' AS month_target ,cast(isnull(tm.qli,0) AS decimal(38,2)) AS tm_qli ,cast(isnull(lm.qli,0) AS decimal(38,2)) AS lm_qli ,'-' AS year_target ,cast(isnull(ty.qli,0) AS decimal(38,2)) AS ty_qli ,cast(isnull(ly.qli,0) AS decimal(38,2)) AS ly_qli
FROM TY_YEAR AS ty LEFT JOIN TY_MONTH AS tm ON tm.bannerId=ty.bannerId LEFT JOIN LY_MONTH AS lm ON lm.bannerId=ty.bannerId LEFT JOIN LY_YEAR AS ly ON ly.bannerId=ty.bannerId )
SELECT base.bannerId ,'-' ,sum(cast(isnull(base.tm_qli,0) AS decimal(38,2))) ,'-' ,sum(cast(isnull(base.lm_qli,0) AS decimal(38,2))) ,CASE WHEN isnull(sum(base.tm_qli), 0) = 0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN isnull(sum(base.lm_qli), 0) = 0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(base.lm_qli) - sum(base.tm_qli))/sum(base.tm_qli)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END
,'-' ,sum(cast(isnull(base.ty_qli,0) AS decimal(38,2))) ,'-'
FROM base GROUP BY base.bannerId
UNION ALL
SELECT 'KA Total' ,'-' ,sum(cast(isnull(base.tm_qli,0) AS decimal(38,2))) ,'-' ,sum(cast(isnull(base.lm_qli,0) AS decimal(38,2))) ,CASE WHEN isnull(sum(base.tm_qli), 0) = 0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN isnull(sum(base.lm_qli), 0) = 0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(base.lm_qli) - sum(base.tm_qli))/sum(base.tm_qli)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END
,'-' ,sum(cast(isnull(base.ty_qli,0) AS decimal(38,2))) ,'-'
FROM base
